DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label study evaluate pituitary ovarian suppression healthy , reproductive-aged woman use three different regimen oral contraceptive ( OCs ) . Two extended regimen OCs , Seasonale ( levonorgestrel/ethinyl estradiol 0.15/0.03 mg 84 day follow 7 day placebo ) , Seasonique ( levonorgestrel/ethinyl estradiol 0.15/0.03 mg 84 day follow 7 day ethinyl estradiol 0.01 mg ) , 28-day regimen OC , Portia ( levonorgestrel/ethinyl estradiol 0.15/0.03 mg 21 day follow 7 day placebo ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Suppression Pituitary-Ovarian Axis With Three Different Oral Contraceptive Regimens
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal Not pregnant breastfeed Weight < 200 lb Currently take oral contraceptive standard 28day regimen least two month Any contraindication use oral contraceptive Pregnancy within last 3 month Smoking > 10 cigarette per day
